description: Developing responsive user interfaces and enhancing user experience for various applications using React, CSS, and JavaScript. Collaborating closely with design teams to ensure optimal design implementation.
Assisted in the development and optimization of web applications, focusing on performance enhancements and improving overall user experience.
Gained hands-on experience in software development, working on projects involving both frontend and backend technologies, including HTML, CSS, and Node.js.
Developed custom websites for small businesses, focusing on user-friendly designs and optimized performance. Utilized various technologies to enhance web functionality.
